Question: When does Vault’s Collect ability grant 2 non‑Gold essences?
Answer: Only if at least one Gold remains on the Vault at Collect time.
Rationale: Owner must leave Gold on Vault to take interest.:contentReference[oaicite:42]{index=42}:contentReference[oaicite:43]{index=43}
